sentences.english: The milling machine was firmly chocked up.
sentences.chinese: 那臺銑牀用楔子穩固地支墊著。

sentences.english: The Seal, solid in configuration, is simple and honest, majestic and supreme.
sentences.chinese: 印章構型穩固，古樸敦厚，大氣渾然，至尊無上。

sentences.english: Marshalled by Ferdinand and Wes Brown, however, United's defence rarely creaked under the Latics' pressure.
sentences.chinese: 由於有費迪南德和布朗坐鎮，曼聯的防線還算穩固。

sentences.english: First, frequent high level visits consolidated the political basis of our relations.
sentences.chinese: 一是高層互訪空前密切，中歐政治基礎更加穩固。

sentences.english: Croup well formed and only slightly inclined with hip bones hardly apparent.
sentences.chinese: 臀部穩固而略傾斜，臀骨幾乎不可見。

sentences.english: The back is straight, very strongly developed without sag or roach, and relatively short.
sentences.chinese: 後背直，非常穩固，沒有下陷或拱起。

sentences.english: With such a view your Awakening practice Will be strong and firm-minded.
sentences.chinese: 生此正見覺醒修持將變得堅強心穩固。

sentences.english: If you doubt yourself, then indeed you stand on shaky ground。(Ibsen, Norwegian dramatist)
sentences.chinese: 如果你懷疑自己，那麼你的立足點確實不穩固了。

sentences.english: When the cofferdams are completed and made safe, the water trapped between them is pumped out.
sentences.chinese: 圍堰完工穩固後，就將圍堰間的水抽乾。

sentences.english: If you doubt yourself, then indeed you stand on shaky.
sentences.chinese: 如果懷疑自己，你的出發點就不穩固了。

sentences.english: The row seat frame adopting the structure has the advantages of firm connection and low probability of looseness.
sentences.chinese: 採用該結構的排椅椅架，連接穩固，不易鬆動。

sentences.english: The BS expander makes sure that the telescopic sections hold firm at the adjusted length.
sentences.chinese: BS系統的膨脹拴可以確保調整過長度的杖杆的穩固。

sentences.english: Her feet firmly planted on the tepid rough brick of the floor.
sentences.chinese: 她一雙腳穩固地立在微溫而粗糙的磚地上。

sentences.english: A concrete wall has more stability than a wooden fence.
sentences.chinese: 水泥牆比木柵欄穩固的多。

sentences.english: Make sure outrigger were fully extended and installed on firm pad.
sentences.chinese: 確保外伸支架全部伸出並穩固於地面上。

sentences.english: They attract, involve and fidelize your costumers.
sentences.chinese: 他們會吸引並穩固您的客戶。

definition: variant of 關係|关系[guan1 xi5]
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to maintain/to keep up/to hold together
